sentences.sentence: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.translation: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

sentences.sentence: The bank first learned of the problem when it carried out an internal audit.
sentences.translation: 银行是在进行内部审计时最先得知这个问题的。

sentences.sentence: One accounting firm, EY, uses an AI system that helps review contracts during an audit.
sentences.translation: 安永会计师事务所在审计中使用人工智能系统来审查合同。
